articles.author: Madhu Balaji
articles.title: Sensex scales over 84,100 after weak start, Nifty at one-year high led by Reliance, Asian Paints
articles.description: Nifty 50 climbed to a one-year high as gains in Reliance Industries ahead of its earnings announcement today offset declines in Infosys and Wipro, which slipped on margin concerns despite reporting strong results
articles.content: The domestic market staged an impressive intraday recovery on Friday, with the Sensex touching a 4-month high, trading over 84,000 mark for the first time since June 2025, after opening marginally lo… [+2282 chars]
